byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, Karam Shoumali from Istanbul, and Maher Samaan from Paris.

abstract: Zahran Alloush, leader of Syrian government opposition group Army of Islam, dies in airstrike in Syria; local opposition figures attribute strike, which strengthens position of Pres Bashar al-Assad, to Russia, but that information has not been confirmed.
lead_paragraph: The death of the leader, Zahran Alloush, who commanded the Army of Islam, is a significant blow to the armed opposition in the Syria conflict.

headline.main: Powerful Syrian Rebel Leader Reported Killed in Airstrike
headline.print_headline: In Blow to Syrian Insurgents, Airstrike Is Said to Kill Rebel Leader

snippet: The death of the leader, Zahran Alloush, who commanded the Army of Islam, is a significant blow to the armed opposition in the Syria conflict.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
